body.name: Stanley The Perfect-Brew Pour Over
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 8 hrs 35 mins
features: Note: 1)Too coarse a grind, too little coffee, or insufficiently tamping the grounds before brewing can all lead to inadequate pressure for a proper brew. 2)It is important to note that the amount of espresso extracted will vary depending on the grind size and amount and reprogramming may be needed when the size and amount are adjusted

BEST BREW EVERY TIME: Refresh your coffee experience with Stanley products coffee maker! The Stanley Pour Over coffee maker is a traditional way to brew using a Stainless Steel filter. Brew pour over coffee like a pro at home. It is easy to use, and environmentally friendly

STAINLESS STEEL FILTERS: The stainless steel design is stylish and non-breakable. The stainless steel filter helps extract your coffee's aromatic oils and subtle flavors instead of being absorbed by a paper filter. It’s a smarter option for your coffee. The perfect solution for brewing your fresh brewed coffee at home, in your office, or outdoors

EASY TO USE: Pour the desired amount of coffee into the filter, place on top of a cup, coffee mug, slowly pour in the hot water, let the coffee maker drip out the water through the fine pour over filter, and remove the coffee dripper when done. Now you are ready to enjoy your drink

EASY TO CLEAN: Once done using the coffee brewer, rinse it quickly by hand and immediately use it again within 2-3 minutes for another flavor. Since it is a reusable coffee strainer made from stainless steel, it is better quality than plastic, ceramic, or glass coffee filters, it saves you money not buying paper coffee filters

LIFETIME WARRANTY: ‘BUILT FOR LIFE’. Since 1913 we’ve promised to provide rugged, capable gear for food and drink, built to last a lifetime. It’s a promise we still keep. Stanley products purchased from Stanley Resellers come with a lifetime warranty
body.description: For those who take their coffee seriously, The Perfect-Brew Pour Over is, well, perfect. Constructed of stainless steel, it features an easy-clean filter you can use remove and reuse--no disposable filters needed. Spoon in your favorite medium-ground coffee, saturate with hot water (it's all in the wrist), and wait 2-3 minutes. The Pour Over is thoughtfully designed to work with most Stanley mugs and bottles, so you can brew and go. Just like that. This is coffee done right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally, a Pour Over that Doesn't Require Filters
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this product, and I must say I am thoroughly impressed. The craftsmanship is excellent, evident in its sturdy build and durability. Cleaning is a breeze, making maintenance a hassle-free experience. One standout feature is its reliable performance – so far, I have not encountered any issues with clogging. Overall, a well-made, robust, and easy-to-maintain product that lives up to its promises. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pour over
reviews.reviewText: This pour over is perfect. Sturdy, compact, easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works surprisingly well
reviews.reviewText: I decided to try this as an alternative to buying pour over paper filters. My expectations were not very high, I was looking for a more convenient alternative, especially when I travel. To my surprise, this works really well. I had to adjust my grind size smaller a little bit, but besides that this is giving me a good, consistent strong cup of coffee, and the cleanup is a piece of cake. Glad I got it! My only wish would be that the pore size would be a little smaller to increase the dwell time without reducing the grind size. But that’s really minor in the grand scheme of things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this! I use it every morning. Easy to clean, durable, 10/10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works and it’s sturdy
reviews.reviewText: It’s a pour over coffee filter that’ll last years. What’s to complain about?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My daily coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: Quick and easy. It a good size funnel. It fits inside the neck of a travel coffee cup for stability. The filter is not very fine but great for home ground coffee. Very heavy duty and strong. I recommend that you take the metal filter off and use a paper filter if you use it with pre-ground coffee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for camping?
reviews.reviewText: The Stanley "Perfect-Brew" is not really perfect. It will fit larger cups, so that is good. It comes with it's own reusable filter, so that is good? Not so fast on that one. The filter allows coffee grounds to pass through it, so it doesn't do a very good job filtering you coffee. I guess if you are camping and use it, you could probably let a few grounds through, but for everyday use, take a pass and get something you can use a better filter with. Due to the way this one is made, you can't use a regular coffee filter with it. Not too impressed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for traveling
reviews.reviewText: I'm a fussy coffee drinker. I want my own coffee, rather than hotel fare. So I got this to use in hotels when traveling. I bring a hot pot to boil water to use with this. It is great for my needs. I can have my leisurely cup(s) of coffee without venturing from my room!
Even my husband was impressed. Doesn't take much space and is perfect for your morning coffee. Dleivery was fast too.
Stanley Quality PersonifiedWorks greatPerfect for camping. Just pair with a coffee grinder and you get perfect coffee anywhere

Produto excelente, ótima qualidade e muito funcional. Há tempos vinha procurando algo que substituisse o coador de papel ou pano. Sou muito exigente com café. Tenho uma cafeteira Bialleti e uma elétrica espresso. A Bialleti eesquenta demais água, isso altera o sabor do café. Já o coador Stanley, de metal, mantém a qualidade do café e solta aquele cheirinho gostoso da bebida. O único incoveniente para mim é que, como faço café só para eu tomar na hora, ou seja, faço muito pouco, tenho que escaldar o coador e a chícara para que o café não esfrie. Para quem faz bastante café de uma só vez, isso não é problema. Tem que ter paciência e esperar um pouco até que todo, ou quase todo o café passe pelo coador, como no velho Melita, de papel. Mas recomendo o produto, é meio caro, mas também é um isvestimento para muitos anos. Vale a pena.

reviews.reviewTitle: PERFECTO, ENCAJA CON TERMO STANLEY CLASSIC DE 1.1 QT y Stanley Máster de 1.4 qt
reviews.reviewText: El producto vertidor me encantó, encajó perfectamente con la boca de mi termo Stanley Classic de 1.1 qt con el cual puedo preparar café vertido directamente en el interior del termo, (sólo como dato tengo otro Stanley de 1 litro Aladdin de los 80s de boca más pequeña y en ese termo no encaja el vertidor en la boca), y así cómo en mi taza Stanley de 12oz Aladdin Stanley, el producto se lava perfectamente, basta con una sacudida para deshacerse del gabazo del café y un ligero enjuague con agua para eliminar el resto que queda en el vertidor, se siente un producto sólido con el tacto como un termo Stanley, es un producto hermoso que volvería a comprar. Acabo de encargar la Taza legendaria Stanley para completar este set de vertido, comentaré posteriormente.Actualización a 4 meses de uso, el Pour Over es excelente, me satisface complementarlo con la taza Classic de Stanley, es mi kit favorito de Por Over, sigo destacando su facilidad para limpiar el grano de café que se utiliza en él así como la facilidad de limpiarlo después de cada uso con un simple enjuague, luce bastante bien en mi café bar y para campismo sospechoso qué será igual de excelente, sobre todo por la solidez del mismo y su gran resistencia al ser de acero, un excelente artículo para preparar tu café o simplemente para coleccionar si te gustan los productos de Stanley y eres amante de un buen café. También encaja perfectamente con el termo Stanley Máster de 1.4 qt, y cabe perfectamente en mi lonchera Stanley.Nota: Preparo café en este Pour Over con un ratio de 1:15 y ocupo para moler el molinillo de Hario Slim Pro de acero con la molienda ajustada a 12 clicks, precaliento con agua caliente la taza Classic de Stanley y la desecho, después procedo a la preparación de café.Por Enkil Pardo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to clean to make fast coffee
reviews.reviewText: Easy to clean and reuse it quickly.
